MailmergeTemplate.name: MailmergeTemplate
MailmergeTemplate.description: Represents a mail merge template (a Microsoft Word document) used for performing mail merges for your organization.

Body.description: Required. Microsoft Word document to use as a mail merge template. Due to limitations with Microsoft Word mail merge templates, your client application can specify the Body field when creating these records, but not when updating them. Limit: 5 MB.

BodyLength.description: Length of the Microsoft Word document.

Category.description: The type of document template. Possible values are: Document Envelope Label The default value is Document.

Description.description: Required. Text description of this mail merge template. Limit: 255 characters.

Filename.description: Required. File name of the Microsoft Word document that was uploaded as a mail merge template. Limit: 255 characters in length.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

LastUsedDate.description: Date and time when this MailmergeTemplate was last used.

Name.description: Required. Name of this mail merge template.

SecurityOptionsAttachmentHasFlash.description: Required. True if Flash Injection was detected in the attachment.

SecurityOptionsAttachmentHasXSSThreat.description: Required. True if a cross site scripting threat was detected in the attachment.

SecurityOptionsAttachmentScannedforFlash.description: Required. True if the attachment has been scanned for Flash Injection.

SecurityOptionsAttachmentScannedForXSS.description: Required. True if the attachment has been scanned for a cross site scripting threat.
